p.k: Comedy, Crime, Drama, Art, Classic Mexico (1955). Hrají: Miroslava Stern, Ernesto Alonso, Ariadna Welter, Rita Macedo. Režie: Luis Bunuel.
p.d: The Criminal Life of Archibaldo de la Cruz is a story about a man whose biggest dream was to become a serial killer. One of the latest and underrated Buńuel’s works. An oddly charming black comedy dressed up as a kind of thriller. A hilarious and vicious story about the impossibilties of fulfilling one's fantasies and desires, which in this case are all about murder.
